sentence.Network_en: The boy aims at becoming an agriculturist.
sentence.Network_cn: 男孩一心想成为农学家.

sentence.Network_en: This helps to explain the unfortunate experience of a certain agriculturist from the U.S. assigned to duty in another country.
sentence.Network_cn: 这对解释某位被分配到另一国家去工作的美国农业学家的不幸遭遇是有帮助的.

sentence.Network_en: But young Walter Franklin was a modern agriculturist.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过年轻的沃尔特·富兰克林是位现代农业者.

means.word_mean: 1. someone concerned with the science or art or business of cultivating the soil

sentences.cn: 这一发现，想必会使西方的农学家感兴趣。
